message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but you get a decent chunk.
I'm willing to be generous, but 1000 is far too low. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile with the inflation.
This is a very fair offer considering the inflation is only affecting you. I'm standing firm on this.
I'm getting desperate here. Let's split it more evenly.  This is my final offer before we both lose more.
Alice, we're running out of time.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
